response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both of us, as it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am proposing to sell it to you for $14,500. This is a special offer, tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while allowing me to maximize the value of my asset. I look forward to hearing your response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 14500}
